DOC.brief_summary: Specific immunotherapy with recombinant birch pollen allergen rBet v1-FV
DOC.brief_title: Specific Immunotherapy With Recombinant Birch Pollen Allergen rBet v1-FV
DOC.criteria: Positive RAST result to birch pollen Positive Skin Prick Test reaction to birch pollen positive nasal provocation test result to birch pollen extract serious chronic diseases other relevant seasonal allergies
